T08jsphustu:5: saddharmasacchiṣyagaṇān samastān namāmi buddhān bahuśaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ //
T08jsphustu:7: bodhyaṅgamārgaphalitaṃ hi jinālijuṣṭaṃ mañjuśriyaṃ ca śubhakalpataruṃ namāmi //
T08jsphustu:10: tatra prāyeṇa hi santo gurviṣṭadevatāṃ pūjayitvā kriyāyāṃ pravartante puṇyaprasavārtha,
T08jsphustu:12: ahamapi ca sadācāro 'yamiti kṛtvā śrīghanā cārasaṃgrahārambhe svadevatānamaskāraṃ kartuṃ pravṛtta iti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:14: tatra trividhaḥ saṃkleśaḥ- kleśasaṃkleśaḥ karmasaṃkleśaḥ janmasaṃkleśaśca /
T08jsphustu:19: kleśa eva (SŚ 2) saṃkleśaḥ kleśasaṃkleśaḥ kleśasvabhāvatvāt kleśasaṃkleśahetutvācca kleśasaṃkleśa ityuccate /
T08jsphustu:32: ataḥ kleśakarma saṃkleśakarma saṃkleśaphalatvāt kleśasaṃkleśahetutvācca janmasaṃkleśa ityucyate /
T08jsphustu:33: ata eva nirdeśo nālpīyān na ca bhūyān ratnatrayavat /
T08jsphustu:35: prahīṇāḥ [paritya]ktāḥ apanītāstiraskṛtāḥ aśeṣāḥ nikhilā vāsanāsahitāḥ saṃkleśā kleśa[karma]janmākhyāyena [buddhena] bhagavatā,
T08jsphustu:46: tathāgatadharmeṣu anekaloka[dhātuga]teṣu deśeṣu atītānāgatabhedabhinneṣu ca na bhavatyevākliṣṭamajñānaṃ /
T08jsphustu:48: tathāgatasya śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñāna[darśana]skandhamiti
T08jsphustu:49: pṛṣṭenoktaṃ- no bhadanteti sūtrāt āryamahāmaudgalyāyanasya svamātṛjanmadeśāparijñānāt
T08jsphustu:53: niścayena dhīyante avatiṣṭhante asmin bhāvā iti nidhirādhāraḥ /
T08jsphustu:56: iha tu tatsādharmyāt yathā mahāsamudro gambhīratvāt atiduruttaratvāccāmbhonidhirucyate,
T08jsphustu:57: evaṃ jñeyamapi duṣparijñānāt samastānāvedyatvena duravagāhayatvāt ambhonidhiḥ /
T08jsphustu:63: tamīdṛgviśiṣṭaṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ praṇamya kāyavāṅmanobhiriti śeṣaḥ /
T08jsphustu:64: samānakartṛkayoḥ kriyayoḥ pūrvakāle 'yaṃ ktvā vidhīyate prāṇamyeti /
T08jsphustu:66: ataḥ pṛcchayate kaṃ praṇamya kiṃ kariṣyasītyāha- śrāmaṇerāṇāmācāraḥ saṃgrahīṣyate /
T08jsphustu:68: (SŚ 4) athavā śrāmaṇyamamalo mārgaḥ tamīranti gacchantīti śrāmaṇerāḥ /
T08jsphustu:72: nanu ca evaṃ sati granthasyācāratvaṃ na prāpnoti kriyārūpatvāt /
T08jsphustu:74: ācārapratipādako 'pi grantha ācāra ucyata iti upacārāt jātakamālāvat kaṃsavadhavat /
T08jsphustu:81: saṃkṣepato 'smin śloke buddhasya bhagavataḥ prahāṇasaṃpat jñānasaṃpat,
T08jsphustu:93: nanu cācāraḥ saṃgrahīṣyata iti anantarābhidhānādācāraḥ saṃgrahītavyaḥ kasmāt śaraṇagamanādikamucyate?
T08jsphustu:95: te ca śrāmaṇerā daśaśikṣā padaparigṛhītā eva prādhānyenābhipretāḥ, na gṛhiṇaḥ /
T08jsphustu:96: sa eṣa śrāmaṇeramāvaḥ teṣāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ kathaṃ bhavati,
T08jsphustu:98: ato yathoddeśaḥ tathā nirdeśa iti nyāyāt śrāmaṇerabhāva eva tāvadādau vaktavya ityāha /
T08jsphustu:102: bahavaḥ śaraṇaṃ yānti parvatāṃśca vanāni ca /
T08jsphustu:108: evaṃ bhagavānapi bhūtabhāvisāṃpratikādhvanirmuktajñeyabuddhervikāśanāt mohasaṃkocāpagamāt buddha ityucyate / tathā cāha-
T08jsphustu:112: athavā yaḥ puruṣo vyapanītanidraḥ suptotthito vibuddha ityucyate /
T08jsphustu:113: evaṃ bhagavānapi saṃsāramahāśayanādutthitaḥ ajñānanidrāpagamāt bauddhasya jñānasya sākṣātkaraṇādbuddha ityucyate / tathā cāha-
T08jsphustu:115: yo vibuddhaḥ sa vai buddho vibuddhapuruṣo yathā // iti /
T08jsphustu:117: anuttareṇa jñānena budhyate vā śivamiti buddhaḥ /
T08jsphustu:118: sa ca trividhena dharmasāmbhogikena nairmāṇikena ca vyavasthita iti anyatra śāstrāntare nirdiṣṭamiti granthagauravaparihārārthamiti iha nābhidhīyate
T08jsphustu:127: catvāraḥ pratipannakāḥ catvāraḥ phalāptāḥ abhedyatvena saṃghagatatvāt aṣṭau mahāpuruṣapudgalāḥ saṃgha ityucyante /
T08jsphustu:134: bhettuṃ na śakyate yasmāt tasmāt saṃgho 'bhidhī(ya)te // iti /
T08jsphustu:135: atastaṃ buddhaṃ dharma saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ yo ga[ta]vāniti yāvadeṣaḥ śrāmaṇero munermata (SŚ 7)
T08jsphustu:139: atha kimarthamādau pañcaśikṣāpadāni na grāhyante śaraṇagama[nā]didānataḥ /
T08jsphustu:142: ato yadi na pañcaśikṣāpadāni ādau na grāhyante na trīṇi śaraṇagamanādīni pradīyante,
T08jsphustu:147: pravṛttinivṛttyātmake śīle vā pratipattirācaraṇaṃ samādānataḥ śīle sammukhīkaraṇamiti yo 'rthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:162: buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitaṃ anupravrajāmīti yo vācamudīrayatītyarthaḥ //
T08jsphustu:168: vadhaśca steyañca maithunaṃ cānṛtavākyaṃ ceti vadhasteyamaithunānṛtavākyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:170: kiṃ virata iti paurastyena padena saṃbandhaḥ /
T08jsphustu:171: kimetasmādeva yo virataḥ saṃvarī bhaṇyate? netyāha /
T08jsphustu:177: te ca kadācit aprāptamadyasadbhāve bhavata iti /
T08jsphustu:203: atra sūryodayādāramya yāvat keśamātrāna tītako madhyāhnakālaśabdenābhidhīyate /
T08jsphustu:204: vigataḥ sa īdṛgvidhaḥ kālo yasyāparāhṇādeḥ sa vikālaḥ /
T08jsphustu:215: yaḥ prāṇātipā[tā]dvirataḥ yāvajjātarūparaja taparigrahāt sa eṣaḥ śrāmaṇero (SŚ 9)
T08jsphustu:218: yadyapi sarve buddhā bhagavantaḥ kāyavākcittamaunato muniriti sāmānyavācinā muniśabdenābhidhīyante,
T08jsphustu:222: śākyaśabdalopaṃ vā kṛtvā idaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ mu narmata iti /
T08jsphustu:224: saṃkṣepatastaduktaṃ bhavati- ratnatraye śaraṇaṃ gatvā pañcaśikṣāpadāni parigṛhyabuddha
T08jsphustu:225: bhagavantaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajāmīti vācamuccārya prāṇātipātādvirato yāvat jātarūparajataparigrahācca
T08jsphustu:237: tacca kaścit pradeśo 'pi saṃbhavati ityataḥ sakalagrahaṇaṃ /
T08jsphustu:238: tena sakalena śarīreṇa sarveṇa prakāreṇa kāyenetyarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:251: prāṇiśabdena ca manuṣyagatiparyāyaḥ eva gṛhayate na prāṇimātraṃ,
T08jsphustu:254: tena strīpuruṣapaṇḍakaṃ pañcaśākhādi[nir]vṛttaṃ mārayataḥ syādeva saṃvaratyāgaḥ /
T08jsphustu:255: anena ślokena kāyiko vikramaḥ pratiṣiddho bhavati //
T08jsphustu:263: udyānayātrā tava paralokagamanamiti śrutvā kaścidātmāna hanyāt /
T08jsphustu:264: tadidānīṃ atra duṣkṛtapūrvakaḥ saṃvaratyāga iti pratiṣidhyate /
T08jsphustu:267: śastraṃ harati vahatīti vā śastrahāro vadhyaghātakaḥ /
T08jsphustu:274: pūrvoktaparyāyavyatirekai ranyairapi prayogairmārayataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti pratipādayannāha /
T08jsphustu:287: kecit garbhaśātananimittaṃ virekādikaṃ na kuryāditi nimittasaptamīṃ varṇayanti //
T08jsphustu:288: na kevalaṃ amunā prayogeṇa mārayituṃ na labhyate maraṇanimittamātramapi kartuṃ na sulabhyata iti pratipādayannāha /
T08jsphustu:303: dauḥśīlaṃ śīlaviratiḥ prakṛtisāvadyāt prajñaptisāvadyāt bhagavatā pratiṣiddhādvikālabhojanādeḥ duḥkhatāpopa śamanādapratisārā dinā prahlāditvena
T08jsphustu:304: sukhaṃ śīlasamādānaṃ kāyo na paritapyata iti gāthāvacanāt /
T08jsphustu:306: phalāni catvāri srotāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ arhatphalaṃ /
T08jsphustu:310: vadhakenāpi cittena bhrāntyā mārayataḥ saṃvaratyāgo na bhavatī ti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:313: atasteṣu madhyapaścātpurogeṣu manuṣyeṣu gacchatsu yatraiva vadhakaṃ manaḥ yasminneva puruṣe vadhakacittaṃ tameva puruṣaṃ dhnato mārayataḥ /
T08jsphustu:316: nānyaṃ tasmātpuruṣādanyaṃ puruṣaṃ bhrāntyā mārayataḥ asya hiṃsā na bhavatītyarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:323: anyadapi prayogāntaraṃ na kāryaṃ māraṇāyeti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:339: mṛtyuhetoḥ sthānopadeśamātramapi kartuṃ na labhyate iti darśayitumāha /
T08jsphustu:345: caurādibhyo bhayaṃ yatra yasmin mārge pathi bhavati tasya panthānaṃ dehināṃ prāṇināṃ nāśāya vināśārthaṃ yatirna kathayet //
T08jsphustu:346: viṣamanadīpratāraṇamapi tartuṃ na kalpayati tamiti darśayitumāha /
T08jsphustu:352: yatra yasyā nadyāḥ tīrthe bhayaṃ bhavet tattīrthaṃ na prakāśayet //
T08jsphustu:353: kiñca rājñā vā yatra ghātyate tanmārgaṃ na prakāśayediti daṇḍādidānapratiṣedhopāyena paraṃ ghātayituṃ na kṣamata iti darśayitumāha /
T08jsphustu:361: ityevaṃ samucitaṃ pratyāyādānārtha pratibaddhasya puruṣa syāntike 'yuktaṃ ayuktarūpaṃ vacanaṃ na vadedityeke /
T08jsphustu:363: samantāt sarvatra kārye niyuktaḥ ityāyuktaḥ vyāpṛtaka ucyate,
T08jsphustu:364: tenāyuktena baddhaḥ saṃruddha yo 'nyaḥ puruṣaḥ tasmin baddhāyukte puruṣe ityevaṃ na vadet /
T08jsphustu:365: varaṃ mriyasva mā tvaṃ kiñcit dravyaṃ rājñe dehīti /
T08jsphustu:366: anyathā hi yaḥ saruddho vyāpṛtakaḥ tasmin baddhāyukta ityevaṃ na vadedityarthaḥ pūrvavat /
T08jsphustu:367: anyathā varaṃ mriyasva mā tvaṃ kiñcidayuktāya dehi ityuktaṃ syāt /
T08jsphustu:368: na bhūpataya iti niyuktairnānyasya puruṣasya baddhatvāt //
T08jsphustu:369: sabhayaṃ layanaṃ vadhakacittenopadeṣṭuṃ na kalpata iti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:373: / (SŚ 14) yasmin layane sarpādibhayaṃ bhavati tadvadhakābhi prāyeṇāgantukāyabhikṣave noddiśet /
T08jsphustu:374: ya uddiśati tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati asati maraṇe,
T08jsphustu:378: yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ śaṭhajātīyaḥ vyāghraṃ hanmīti vyapadeśaṃ kṛtvā śatruṃ hanyāt sa vihārād ghaṭṭanīyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:383: tathā kartavyaṃ yathā na jovedekāpyariḥ śatruriti /
T08jsphustu:389: krakacena karayantreṇa upamā yasmin mṛte tadevamucyate /
T08jsphustu:394: eko dvau trayo vāpi ye śrāmaṇerā vadhīkṛtā māraṇābhiprāyato /
T08jsphustu:405: kadācidupakramaṃ karoti nṛsaṃjñānavati na tvasau manuṣya ityāha /
T08jsphustu:420: jīvitakṣayaśceti pañca[mama]ṅgaṃ ityetāni pañcāṅgāni nṛghātane manuṣyavadhe veditavyāni /
T08jsphustu:423: teṣāṃ pañcāṅgāni na siddhyanti nare vadhakacetanetyasya padasyaikāṅgatvāt /
T08jsphustu:430: jīvitā dravyaparopito bhavati iyatā prāṇātipātī bhavati /
T08jsphustu:431: atra ca prāṇī bhavati ityādi sarvaḥ prathamānto nirdeśaḥ /
T08jsphustu:432: tathā kārikāntareṇāpi upakrama iti nṛsaṃjñāvadhakacetaneti prathamāntanirdeśaḥ kṛtaḥ /
T08jsphustu:434: viṣaśastrādiprayogeṇāpi mārayituṃ na nirdiśyata iti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:437: yadi tenaiva prayogeṇa naro mriyate tadāsau prayoktāsaṃvarī saṃvarādbhraśyate /
T08jsphustu:445: avakrītādeḥ saṃvaratyāgo [na] bhavatīti matvā naraṃ mārayet /
T08jsphustu:448: unmattavikṣiptacetasastu śrāmaṇerā mārayanto na dauḥ śīlyabhājo bhavanti smṛterabhāvāt /
T08jsphustu:454: taiḥ kāruṇikaiḥ maitraṃ kāyakarma maitraṃ vākkarma maitraṃ manaḥ karma prāṇiṣu sattveṣu sarvadā sarvasmin kāle kartavyaṃ yatinā śrāmaṇereṇeti
T08jsphustu:475: kṛmigīrūpādīnāṃ vihiṃsanaṃ mithyājīvaśca karṣaṇe sati yasmāt kāraṇāt bhavati tasmāddhetoḥ karṣaṇa dūrādeva tyajet //
T08jsphustu:483: vyaparopya tasya māṃsena yadvyañjanaṃ kṛtaṃ tat bhakṣayato yateḥ śrāmaṇerasya yasmānnighṛṇaṃ niṣkṛpaṃ cittaṃ jāyate /
T08jsphustu:484: ataḥ kadācit uddiśya kṛtaṃ bhakṣayan lobhānalenāpūryamāṇaḥ prāṇivadhamapi kuryāt iti hiṃsā yasya saṃbhāvyate /
T08jsphustu:488: abhrāntimatā nirīkṣitena śrutena śaṅkitena vā taduddiśya kṛtaṃ boddhavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:495: gṛhābaddhā ye pakṣimṛgaśūkarādayaḥ teṣāṃ yat pakṣaśṛṅgādi [tad]darśanāt- kimete mṛgapakṣiśūkarādayo mamoddiśya hatā na veti āśaṅkā utpadyate
T08jsphustu:496: satyāmāśaṅkāyāṃ dānapatiḥ praṣṭavyaḥ- kimete mamoddiśya hatā na veti /
T08jsphustu:498: yadidaṃ dānapatiḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sannevaṃ vadet- tvannimittaṃ tavārthe 'mī mṛgādayo hatā iti /
T08jsphustu:499: evaṃ sati tasmin gṛhe na bhuñjīta /
T08jsphustu:501: virataḥ prāṇināṃ vadhādityanena gṛhītaśikṣasyāyaṃ pratiṣedho netarasyeti darśayati /
T08jsphustu:506: mātāpitroryajñasya kṛte hatā ityevaṃ sati doṣāsti nāśnatāṃ /
T08jsphustu:507: evaṃ dātari bruvāṇe sati bhuñjānānāṃ na kaściddoṣo bhavatītyarthaḥ //
T08jsphustu:509: yadyekaṃ śrāmaṇeramārabhya kṛtaṃ matsyādikaṃ māsaṃ vyañjanaṃ tadanyeṣāmapi śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ yatīnāṃ bhogāya na kalpate /
T08jsphustu:510: bhikṣubhikṣuṇyopāsakopāsikānāṃ samuddiśya kṛtañca yattadapi paribhogāya na kalpate /
T08jsphustu:521: nātra jantuśabdena matsyādayaḥ parigṛhyante teṣāṃ vivecanakṣamatvāt /
T08jsphustu:530: yāvatā vṛkṣasekagurusnānaṃ kuryānnāśuddhavāriṇā ityasyāṃ kārikāyāṃ saprāṇakena vṛkṣasekādipratiṣedhādayamapi kāryo 'vagata eva /
T08jsphustu:531: yatra hi sekaḥ pratiṣidhyate sutarāṃ tatra pānapratiṣedhaḥ /
T08jsphustu:533: na atra mukhākāreṇa māraṇābhiprāyo 'sti pātukāmatāyāḥ prādhānyāt /
T08jsphustu:537: vārītyādi / jalaṃ pāvayituṃ dharmakaraṅkaṃ khallakasahitaṃ sthāpayet /
T08jsphustu:554: sa hi pṛthivyāśritānapi prāṇakān sūkṣmāntarakārūpikān paśyati /
T08jsphustu:556: bhadantaḥ prajñāsiṃha āha- divyacakṣuṣaḥ kumataya ityucyante /
T08jsphustu:560: nanu cāndhasya jalapratyavekṣā sāmarthyābhāvādeva na bhaviṣyati,
T08jsphustu:565: hastasyāṅguṣṭhāgre āvartā sūkṣmarekhā tāṃ draṣṭuṃ śīlaṃ yasya sa [ta]thoktaḥ,
T08jsphustu:569: tena hastapaścimakāvartadarśinā kiyantaṃ kālaṃ pratyavekṣaṇīyamiti āha /
T08jsphustu:571: locanasyākṣṇorvibhramo mā bhūditi kṛtvā ciraṃ bahukālaṃ na [pa]śyet na nirīkṣayet /
T08jsphustu:577: śāṭhayañcittakauṭilyaṃ yena tathābhūtaṃ nāviṣkaroti asphuṭaṃ pratipadya /
T08jsphustu:583: yāvat kālāntareṇa ṣaṣṭyabdaḥ ṣaṣṭivarṣaḥ kuñjaro hastī paribhramyate /
T08jsphustu:584: śakaṭaṃ vā vaṃśapūrṇaṃ yāvatā kālena kālāntareṇa bhramati,
T08jsphustu:588: ūrdhvā ca adharā ca madhyamā ca ūrdhvādhomadhyamāḥ /
T08jsphustu:592: āsāṃ tisṛṇāmapi bhūmīnāṃ madhye yā yā bhūḥ śuddhimāyāti niḥ prāṇakā bhavati,
T08jsphustu:597: sthūlā mahāntaḥ prāṇakā karatalahatāḥ hastena hatāḥ santaḥ adhaḥ sthalaṃ yānti tatra jalaṃ grahītavyaṃ,
T08jsphustu:600: yadi karatalāhatāḥ santaḥ prāṇino 'dho [na] yānti tadā srāvayitavyaṃ tadudakaṃ /
T08jsphustu:604: yasminnudake prāṇinaḥ kare lagnā uttiṣṭhanti na tatra pāṇipādāsyavastrādikaṃ kṣālayedyatiriti /
T08jsphustu:609: tena tatra gatvā praṣṭavyaṃ- kimatra jalaṃ srāvitaṃ na veti /
T08jsphustu:612: yadi pṛṣṭaḥ san dānapatiḥ bravīti na srāvitamiti,
T08jsphustu:623: yadi tathaiko 'pi srāvaṇāya kuśalo na bhavati,
T08jsphustu:627: sajantukajalamātmīyapātre muktvā kutaḥ punaretadudakamānītamiti pṛṣṭaṃ yataḥ puṣkariṇyāderānītaṃ tatraiva muñcetsvayamiti /
T08jsphustu:628: mā bhūdanyatra kṣāraṃ nīramupaghātakṛtaṃ prāṇināmiti tatraivetyāha /
T08jsphustu:630: athavā yatra sapta divasān pānīyamavatiṣṭhati tatra tat saprāṇakamudakaṃ moktavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:636: kecittadaśuṣyati tatra pānīyāśoṣaṇaṃ nimittamiti nimittasaptamīṃ varṇayanti /
T08jsphustu:641: nīraughaṃ jalaughaṃ voḍhuṃ śīlaṃ yasyeti bhāvaḥ /
T08jsphustu:643: tasminnīdṛgvidhe vṛṣṭe sati tāni [sa]prāṇakāni jalāni nimnagānāṃ patiṃ mahāsamudrapātaṅgacchateti uktvā visarjayet /
T08jsphustu:646: tadā tat saprāṇakaṃ jalaṃ kiṃ kartavyamityāha /
T08jsphustu:649: vaktraṃ mukhaṃ dīrghaṃ yasyā rajjudvayena ca (SŚ 22)
T08jsphustu:651: tayā dūragatādhvagena udake kūpe adhastāttadudakaṃ muñcet //
T08jsphustu:654: tisro ghaṭikāḥ pratyavekṣya mārgageṇa udapānataḥ kūpāt jalaṃ pātavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:670: yatopyūrdhvādhomadhyamāstisraḥ salilasyāpi bhūmayaḥ iti kārikāyāṃ stokaṃ pratyavekṣitavyamiti yuktaṃ na ca tatra sarvaṃ śikṣāpadañcedaṃ,
T08jsphustu:688: rajjuśca ghaṭikā ca rajjughaṭike tayo rdānaṃ parityāgaḥ /
T08jsphustu:692: saha prāṇakena vartata iti saprāṇakaṃ jalaṃ, tasmin /
T08jsphustu:695: tatsaprāṇakamudakaṃ parasmai pibeti vaktuṃ dātuṃ vā na jātu kadācit yatiḥ kṣamate /
T08jsphustu:697: kiṃ tena saprāṇakamidaṃ taḍāgādi ityapi na vaktavyamityāha /
T08jsphustu:699: iyaṃ puṣkariṇī sarittaḍāgādi saprāṇakamiti pareṣāmuccaiḥ śabdairna vadet /
T08jsphustu:704: tadā kuru kāryaṃ na veti samīkṣyeti /
T08jsphustu:705: pṛṣṭaḥ prativadet parān pratyavekṣya jala kṛtyaṃ kuru /
T08jsphustu:706: ityevaṃ sati pṛṣṭaḥ san paraṃ yatirvadet /
T08jsphustu:712: saprāṇakamidaṃ taḍāgādi na veti sphuṭaṃ vaktavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:714: evaṃ tarhyātmanaḥ saprāṇakajalapānapratiṣedhāt pareṣāñca dānapratiṣedhāt vṛkṣādīnāmacetanānāṃ saprāṇakenodakena sekānnadānaṃ na nirudhyate /
T08jsphustu:718: (SŚ 24) upādhyāyācāryāṇāmapi snānaṃ na kāryamiti anena bāhyabhogo nivāritaḥ //
T08jsphustu:719: kiṃ punarjalameva saprāṇakamokṛtaṃ dātraṃ vakraṃ na kuryāt,
T08jsphustu:732: saha matkuṇairvattate yacchayanaṃ tadātape na śoṣa yat /
T08jsphustu:733: hime kardame śotavāriṇi uṣṇavāriṇi vā [na] kṣipet /
T08jsphustu:736: caityārāmavihārādīnāṃ navakarma sajantukenodakena na yatiḥ kuryāt /
T08jsphustu:738: srāvayitvā tadudakaṃ dināntaṃ na sakalaṃ divasaṃ trikoṇakaṃ khallakaṃ dhāryaṃ dhārayitavyamityarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:739: kintu kālena kālaṃ parisrāvaṇaṃ moktavyaṃ prāṇakānāṃ pīḍāparihārārthaṃ duṣkṛtaparihārārthañceti //
T08jsphustu:752: tadā yāvatsaptapuṭake[na] khallakena srāvyaṃ tadambhaḥ pānīyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:760: ete hi kuṇarūpiṇaḥ prāṇakāḥ abhūtvā saṃbhavanti,
T08jsphustu:762: yadā tāvadamī prāṇakā bhūtvā bhavāntaraṃ janmāntaraṃ yānti,
T08jsphustu:771: ucchīdanti uchrayeṇa catvāryaṅgulāni yasya mañcādeḥ tasmāt nadyādau salilaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:774: etaduktaṃ bhavati- nadītaḍāgādiṣu mañcapīṭhasaṃsthānaṃ dhāraṇapātraṃ ghanena paṭenāveṣṭaya
T08jsphustu:775: madhye tu upalādikaṃ datvā udake nimajya caturāṅgulamucchritaṃ kṛtvā tadantargatamudakaṃ
T08jsphustu:778: chidrite kāṣṭhamaye karṇadvaye āsaktaṃ baddhaṃ yatsūtraṃ,
T08jsphustu:780: tena baddhaṃ dvidaṇḍake daṇḍakadvaye yaddhāraṇapātrakaṃ tattathoktaṃ /
T08jsphustu:781: (SŚ 26) tadīdṛgvidhaṃ dhāraṇapātrakaṃ trikoṇakasya khallakasya bahirheṣṭhaṃ dadhyāt //
T08jsphustu:783: kṛpayā karuṇayā parītaḥ samantāt idaṃ gṛhīta cittaṃ yasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
T08jsphustu:784: tena kṛpāvatā śrīghanena svādu mṛṣṭaṃ vāri pānīyaṃ sajantukaṃ saprāṇakaṃ kṣārembhasi kṣārīye jale na moktavyaṃ notsraṣṭavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:785: yastu niṣkṛpo muñcati tasya duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati /
T08jsphustu:787: yastu kṣārīye jale mṛṣṭasaṃjñī mṛṣṭābhiprāyastasya anāpat /
T08jsphustu:790: tatra sakalena śarīreṇetyārabhya yāvadavakrītādirityetaiḥ kārikāntarairduṣkṛta pūrvakaḥ saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ /
T08jsphustu:795: sphuṭārthāyāṃ śroghanācārasaṃgrahaṭīkāyāṃ prāṇivadhaviratiśikṣāpadaṃ nāma prathamaṃ samāptaṃ //
T08jsphustu:807: sakṛtparigṛhītaṃ saptāhaṃ kṣamate śrī[gha]nasya bhikṣoriti sāptāhikaṃ ghṛtādi /
T08jsphustu:812: anyadgurudravyaṃ na bhavati sāṃghikasyaiva gurudravyatvena vivakṣitatvāt /
T08jsphustu:817: tadevaṃ kālikaṃ yāvadakalpikaṃ dravyaṃ nādadīta parasvakamiti vakṣyate //
T08jsphustu:833: ebhiraṣṭābhiḥ ṣoḍaśabhiśca dravyaiḥ sarvadravyasaṃgrahaḥ kṛto bhavati /
T08jsphustu:834: yadevaṃ ṣoḍaśabhireva dravyaiḥ sarvadravyasaṃgrahe siddhe kimarthamaṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ pṛthagucyante kālikādīni?
T08jsphustu:836: kintu tebhya eva ṣoḍaśebhyo dravyebhyo niṣkṛṣya kālikāditvamasāṃkaryeṇa pratipādanārthamaṣṭau pariṣkārāḥ pṛthaṅnirdiśyante /
T08jsphustu:850: tasya yaścaturtho bhāgaḥ kākinīnyūnāḥ pañca māṣakāḥ, tān haran /
T08jsphustu:851: athavā tadarghaṃ tanmūlyaṃ dhanaṃ śāṭakādi[s]teyacittaḥ cauryābhiprāyaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ haran sthānāt cyāvayan svīkurvan anyairyatibhirlaghu (SŚ
T08jsphustu:857: caturvāṭāntarāvasthite hastini hriyamāṇe yadi tatra vṛhaddvārā vāṭā bhavanti,
T08jsphustu:858: tadā caturbhiḥ pādaiścyute gaje ayatiḥ bhavati /
T08jsphustu:864: evamanayā kārikayā sthānadvayaṃ pratipādita vistīrṇadvāre pādau sthānamityekaṃ,
T08jsphustu:876: yathā vṛhaddvāravāṭāyāṃ gajasya pādacyutimātreṇa saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ svalpadvārāyāñca niṣkrānte sati,
T08jsphustu:877: evaṃ pañjare 'pi vṛhaddvāre pādacyutimātreṇa svalpadvāre niṣkrānte pakṣiṇi sati yatiḥ dvijahṛtsyāditi /
T08jsphustu:891: yasmin pudgalāyaṇādhitame dravyamamukena pudgalenāsau mṛta ityevaṃ manyatānyasmādadhvagāt
T08jsphustu:892: brahmacāriṇaḥ sakāśācchratvā sīmānte sthātuṃ śīlaṃ yasya tasmai bhāgamadatvā gṛhṇan yatirayatirbhavet,
T08jsphustu:895: atha mṛtasya śrāmaṇerasya taddravyaṃ tatkasya prāpnotītyāha /
T08jsphustu:897: mṛtasya yaterathavārhataḥ parinirvṛtasya yaddravyaṃ tatsarvamupādhyāyasya prāpnotītyevaṃ jagaumuniḥ,
T08jsphustu:902: tatra harturiṣṭāmabhipretāṃ diśaṃ yadi hastī yāyāt,
T08jsphustu:909: hṛto hastī mameti saṃjñā yasya tasmin hṛtasaṃjñini karipe sati asau hartā vratī cauraḥ syādaśrāmaṇero bhavatīti /
T08jsphustu:913: paripanthi cittaṃ ceti catvāri sthānāni nirdiṣṭāni //
T08jsphustu:919: avanau pṛthivyāṃ yā cyutiḥ pātaḥ asyāḥ cyutau satyāṃ bhraśyate /
T08jsphustu:928: yadā anyonyāparijñānādubhau corayataścīvaramālāyā antadvayaṃ muñcatastadā parasparaparigrahaḥ sthānaṃ /
T08jsphustu:931: kṣiptāni prakīrṇāni mauktikahārādīni yasmin mahākule tadevamucyate /
T08jsphustu:932: tatra gato yatiḥ sahāye jāte sati tasyaiva sahāyasya hastāyāṃ prasevikāyāṃ tataḥ kulāt prakīrṇamauktikahārādi gṛhītvā nyasati /
T08jsphustu:933: tannyastaṃ tenaiva sahāyena hārayan kiṃ saṃvaracyutiriti vakṣyate /
T08jsphustu:935: athavā jaṭālena lomaśena śunā kurkureṇa tanmahākulāt taṃ mauktikahārādikaṃ hārayan upalāpya vatsaṃ tṛṇādinā gokāyapotakaṃ haran kiṃ saṃvaracyutiḥ? kiṃ punaḥ (SŚ 32)
T08jsphustu:943: etān ete gāvo hariṣyantīti atra pūrvavadādiśet,
T08jsphustu:945: tadevamādibhistisṛbhiḥ kārikābhirupacāraścittaṃ ca śakaṭādiṣu tatsaṃjñitvaṃ mamatvalābhaśca sthānamuktaṃ //
T08jsphustu:952: atha kuṭilaḥ kīlako bhavatīti bandhanañca śithilaṃ bhavati,
T08jsphustu:954: vakratvena kīlakasya śithilatvena bandhasya kīlakasthānānatikramaṃ darśayati /
T08jsphustu:956: yadā tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ bandhanamuktaṃ bhavati,
T08jsphustu:962: jalaṃ nādeyādi haran yatiryadi pūrārpyataṅgataṃ bhavet,
T08jsphustu:965: avicchinnāyāṃ tu dhārāyāṃ yadi śrāmaṇyāpekṣayā nivartate,
T08jsphustu:970: tayā lipsayā ekasya bhrāturbhāgāt yadi bālamātramapi bhūmi haret tadā kṣatasaṃvarī bhavati /
T08jsphustu:973: atha kiṃ cauragṛhītaṃ pātrādi tyaktāśayasya śanaiḥ punargṛhītuṃ labhyate?
T08jsphustu:975: taskareṇa caureṇa upāttaṃ gṛhītaṃ yatpātrādi taṃ nirāśaḥ san yatiḥ punarbhūyaḥ ādadat gṛhṇan saṃvarād bhraśyata iti /
T08jsphustu:981: kiṃ punastattaskaropāttaṃ pātrādi gopālādidattaṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate? temityāha /
T08jsphustu:983: yadi taccauragṛhītaṃ pātraṃ mitrabhāvena labdhaṃ bhavet mahatā vā kārpaṇyena gopālādibhirvā dattaṃ syāt,
T08jsphustu:986: yadi caurāḥ pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītvā na dadate,
T08jsphustu:989: pātrasya cīvarasya ca muktaye teṣāṃ caurāṇāṃ bhayopadarśanaṃ kārya /
T08jsphustu:990: yatra tu rājani teṣāṃ malimlucāṃ bandhanādikaṃ bhavati,
T08jsphustu:991: tatra gatvā na vaktavya mebhiścauraiḥ vayaṃ muṣitā iti //
T08jsphustu:994: upādhyāyācāryāṇāṃ yatpātracīvaraṃ tvaṃ niṣkāsayasi tadāvayostava ca mama ca /
T08jsphustu:996: tadā dvāvapi tau vratinau taskarau bhavataḥ /
T08jsphustu:1001: atha yadā bahavaḥ śrāmaṇerāḥ saṃbhūya kākinīnyūnān pañca māṣakānapahareyustadā kiṃ te saṃvariṇo bhavantyuta neti?
T08jsphustu:1005: ete yataya ekābhiprāyā mahallakena saha kriyākāraṃ kurvata /
T08jsphustu:1007: kevalaṃ dvāre tiṣṭha vaya caurikāṃ kariṣyāma iti /
T08jsphustu:1017: tasminnāgantuke gate āgatyāgatya yo yatiḥ tatpātracīvara gāpayetsa caurā bhavati /
T08jsphustu:1019: amunānantaroktena prayogeṇa yadi sarve āvāsikāstadāgantukasya pātramapa[ha]reyustadā sava kṣatasaṃvarā bhavanti /
T08jsphustu:1021: sa yadi saṃsmṛtya nayati na kilviṣī /
T08jsphustu:1026: yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ steyacittenānyasya yateḥ pātramanyena yatinā ānāyayati,
T08jsphustu:1029: yastvānetā tasyaivaṃvidhā buddhiretatpātraṃ asyaivānāyayituryaterityevaṃ sati na doṣo,
T08jsphustu:1034: na vā sahārtha iyaṃ tṛtīyā kartari vighānāt /
T08jsphustu:1038: yāvat munerbuddhasya bhagavataḥ pūjā kriyate tāvat saṃghasyāpi pūjāsatkāraḥ pravartate ityevaṃ matvā yaḥ sāṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ stainyacittena stūpāya
T08jsphustu:1039: staupikaṃ vā lābhaṃ saṃghāya dadāti sa kṣatasaṃvaro bhavatyayatirbhavatītyarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1040: nanu ca yāḥ kāścitsaṃpadaḥ sarvāstā bhagavantamāgamyati /
T08jsphustu:1043: etadeva hi vidāraṇaṃ stainyacittasyotthāpakaṃ yathā kāruṇyena salilamapaharata iti /
T08jsphustu:1045: kiṃ punaḥ sāṃghikātkośāt stūpasyoddhārakaṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate? nemityāha /
T08jsphustu:1047: savārikairvā pakṣavārike māsavārāvārikairvā sāṃghikātkośāt likhitvoddhārakaṃ grahītavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1051: taiśca vārikaiḥ karmādānaparisamāptau vaktavyaṃ- iyat hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇādi staupikāt kāśādagṛhītaṃ sāṃghikācca iyaditi /
T08jsphustu:1063: tena mukto yaḥ parakīryo 'śaḥ taṃ haratīti svāṃśamuktaharaḥ,
T08jsphustu:1065: etau yatī ekatra kule lābhaṃ labhete /
T08jsphustu:1066: tayordvayormadhye yaḥ parabhāgaharaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ sa cauro bhavati /
T08jsphustu:1067: viśvāsaṃ tu punardāsyāmīti ca kṛtvā gṛhṇan nāpadaṃ prāpnoti /
T08jsphustu:1070: yaṃ tvaṃ lābhaṃ labhase ahañca yaṃ lābha labhe tadāvayostava ca mama ca vaditvaivaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā samutpanne lābhe sati yastaṃ kriyākāraṃ bhinati tatordhena taskaro bhavati,
T08jsphustu:1073: yathā dvayoḥ kulopakayorekasya kriyākāraṃ bhindataḥ saṃvaracyutiruktā,
T08jsphustu:1076: dvayośca pāṃśukūlikayormadhye pāṃśukūle samutpanne sati yaḥ kriyākāraṃ bhinatti sa cyutasaṃvaro bhavati //
T08jsphustu:1077: prāṅnirdiṣṭaḥ sāṃghiko lābhaḥ stūpāya na dātavyaḥ staupikaśca saṃghāyeti /
T08jsphustu:1078: anyasmai sutarāṃ dātuṃ na labhyata ityabhiniveśatyājanārthaṃ vidhiṃ darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:1087: yadi cellakāḥ sāṃghike vihāre ālepanaṃ saṃmārja[nā]dikaṃ kurvanti tadā tebhyaḥ saṃghataḥ pādāsyaṅsa pūrvāhṇikādi dātavyamanyathā neti /
T08jsphustu:1088: apiśabdena na kevalamupakāryapakāriṇo jñātavyāḥ śrīghanebhyo 'pyevaṃvidhakarmakāribhya iti (SŚ 37) darśayati /
T08jsphustu:1089: nanu ca śrāmaṇerasya pravraji[ta]tvādvināpi vihāralepanādikaraṇena sāṃghikānnapānaparibhogo labhyata eva /
T08jsphustu:1091: idameva āśaṃvayamāne kṛte tricīvareṇa vibhūṣitasya hi bhikṣoḥ sāṃghikānnapānaparibhogo 'nujñāto bhagavatā sūtre,
T08jsphustu:1092: na śrāmaṇarasya ato vighā[nā]ntaramāha bhagavān- śrīghanebhyo 'pīti /
T08jsphustu:1095: sīmāntarāle syātuṃ śolaṃ yasya yatestasmai bhikṣusahitāya bhikṣūṇāyupasyātakāriṇe taṇḍulādikaṃ datvā dārakaprasyavyājena taṇḍulādikaṃ yatirgṛhṇīyāt
T08jsphustu:1097: sīmāntasthāyine adatveti vātrākāraḥ praśliṣṭāstāti matvaivaṃ vyāvakṣate /
T08jsphustu:1098: sīmāntapātine yataye taṇḍulādikamadatvā dārakaprasthavyapadeśena taṇḍulādi na grāhyamiti tadatrobhayasmin pāṭhe na doṣaḥ //
T08jsphustu:1100: atyaktā pātrādi pratyāśā yena sa tathoktaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1106: atyaktāśasya matvā naṣṭaṃ pātracīvaraṃ gṛhītuṃ labhyate, netarasya /
T08jsphustu:1107: evaṃ gṛddho yatiḥ kīdṛśa ityāha naṣṭapātrādiḥ /
T08jsphustu:1112: yastu nirāśībhūtaḥ pātra cīvaraṃ naṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāti,
T08jsphustu:1115: na hi tena caurāt praticaurikā kṛtānapahṛtatvāddravyasya /
T08jsphustu:1118: ete śrāmaṇerā saṃghaśīlakaṃ kṛtvā kriyākāraṃ kurvanti /
T08jsphustu:1119: svādhyāyamadhyayanamuddeśaṃ vā kariṣyāma ityevaṃ kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā ye kriyākāraṃ na pratipālayanti,
T08jsphustu:1121: jinena buddhena bhagavatā ya uditaḥ ukto vinayastaṃ laṃghituṃ śīlaṃ yeṣāṃ te jinoditalaṃghino,
T08jsphustu:1123: tadanena sarvatraivaṃ dhārmika kriyākārātikrame duṣkṛtaṃ bhavatītyākhyātaṃ bhavati //
T08jsphustu:1129: yatra tu stūpe devalakaḥ āste tasmādgṛhṇataḥ syādeva saṃvaratyāgaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1130: anilena vātena tu uddhṛtaṃ kaṃpitaṃ pātitaṃ ca yatpatākādi tatpāṃśukalamiti kṛtvā gahītavyaṃ //
T08jsphustu:1135: kintu tasmāt sthānāducitadānāpradānārtha yatparadravyanayanaṃ tadarthaṃ pareṣāṃ dravyaṃ yatiḥ svayaṃ na nayet,
T08jsphustu:1137: śulkaṃ yatpradānaṃ tasya ca mokṣārthamupāyaṃ nopadiśet- amunā mārgeṇa gaccha,
T08jsphustu:1140: kaścicchaṭhakajātīyo vaṇi[ja]kaḥ śulkapradānamuktaye śulkātprāgyatibhyo yathāvṛddhikayā ratnaṃ datvā paścāt (SŚ 39)
T08jsphustu:1144: tasmin aparijñāte tairyatibhiḥ- evaṃ nāma tvaṃ mohapuruṣa,
T08jsphustu:1145: asmākaṃ visaṃvādayasītyevaṃ suṣṭhuparibhāṣya tadratnaṃ tasyaiva vaṇijā dātavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1150: tasmin pāribhogike dravye muneriva vratināṃ śulka nāsti /
T08jsphustu:1156: yatra grāme nagare vā yaḥ śrāmaṇero varṣāmupagataḥ,
T08jsphustu:1158: jīvitasya brahmacaryasya ca yayoḥ śrāmaṇerayornāśaḥ tayorapi varṣāvāsikalābhā dātavyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1159: tenaitaduktaṃ bhavati- jīvitāntarāyabhayabhītaṃ brahmacaryāntarāyabhayabhītaṃ muktvā anyeṣāmavarṣoṣitānāṃ varṣāvāsikalābho na dātavyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1161: ye śrāmaṇerāḥ prāk śrāvaṇamāsasya pratipadi varṣāmupagatāstaiḥ prāgevāśvinamāsasya pratipadamārabhya varṣāvāsikayācanā kartavyā /
T08jsphustu:1162: ye tu paścāt bhādrapadamāsasya pratipadi varṣāmupagatāstaiḥ paścādeva kārtikamāse /
T08jsphustu:1163: yadi sarvaḥ saṃvaḥ prayamāyāmupagacchati tadā saṃghavaśena paścādupagatairapi yugapadeva varṣāvāsikalābho yācanīyaḥ //
T08jsphustu:1170: tena hi karmaṇā sa pudgalo bhikṣuḥ kriyate /
T08jsphustu:1173: tayā yaḥ pudgalo bhikṣubhāvaṃ parityajya punardīkṣāṃ pravrajyāṃ gṛhṇāti,
T08jsphustu:1174: tasmai api yataye varṣoṣitaiḥ saha samo lābho dātavyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1177: buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ pravrajitamanupravrajāmīti idaṃ karma viśiṣṭārthadyotakatvātkriyākarmeti kṛtvā /
T08jsphustu:1180: tayā yaḥ pudgalaḥ śrāmaṇerabhāvaṃ parityajya punardīkṣāṃ pravrajyāṃ gṛhṇāti,
T08jsphustu:1181: tasmai api yataye varṣoṣitaiḥ saha samo lābho dātavyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1196: amukasmai bhikṣave dātavyoyaṃ madīyo lābha ityevaṃ lābhe samutpanne sati yadi kaścidyatiḥ mriyate tadā niyatamavaśyaṃ tasmai vikalpitabhikṣave sa lābho deya iti bhagavatoktaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1198: ito deśāttraimāsamadhiṣṭhāyānyatra deśāntaragatasya yateḥ lābhaḥ kalpe mandire kalpakuṭayāṃ sthāpayitabyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1200: tadā tebhyaḥ prāśyādi na sāṃghikamannapānādi dātavyaṃ budhaiḥ /
T08jsphustu:1206: avarṣoṣitavibhrāntakudṛṣṭayaśca trayaḥ pudgalāḥ yadānarthaṃ vā kurvanti,
T08jsphustu:1211: tatra yadi dānapati sāmānyenaivaṃ vadet- ācchādaṃ dāsyāmi,
T08jsphustu:1214: ācchādamūlyaṃ dāsyāmītyebhiścaturbhiḥ śabdairutpadyate yo lābhaḥ sa samukhībhūtānāṃ prāpnoti, netareṣāṃ /
T08jsphustu:1224: yasmin divase bhagavānutpannaḥ anuttarāñca samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ tatra yo maho yā pūjā,
T08jsphustu:1226: tata utpanno yo lābhaḥ saṃghasya sa evamucyate /
T08jsphustu:1228: kālikaḥ yāmikaḥ yāvajjīvikaḥ sāptāhikaḥ mṛtapariṣkāraḥ kṣudrapariṣkāraḥ naityakaḥ
T08jsphustu:1229: akālacīvaraṃ kuṭīpratiṣṭhā jātisaṃbodhyādimahodbhavaśceti yo 'yaṃ daśaprakāro lābhaḥ
T08jsphustu:1239: paudgalikatvena vā paribhuñjateraṃ teṣāṃ duṣkṛtaṃ bhavati //
T08jsphustu:1244: saṃmukhībhūtāya vā saṃghāya tatsarvaṃ yatistatra tatropanāmayet /
T08jsphustu:1247: kaściddānapatiḥ vihāramāgatya muktāphalādika datvā tūṣṇīṃ bhūto gacchet /
T08jsphustu:1248: tasmin tūṣṇīṃ datvā gate dānapatau sati buddhāya bhagavate muktā phalādi dātavyaṃ,
T08jsphustu:1251: katibhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'dattādānaṃ gṛhṇan aśrāmaṇero bhavati? āha /
T08jsphustu:1258: kadāciddravyaṃ paropāttamapi sat yatiḥ paropāttasaṃjñā na bhavatītyata āha /
T08jsphustu:1263: kadācidetadaṅgacatuṣṭayaṃ saṃbhavadapi sat taddravya sthānānna cyāvitaṃ syādityata āha /
T08jsphustu:1265: pañcabhiraṅgaiḥ samanvāgato yatiradattamādadāno 'pi na cyutasaṃvaro bhavati /
T08jsphustu:1268: dattasaṃjñā svakasaṃjñā aparopāttasaṃjñā ca vidyate yasya yateḥ sa yathokto yatiḥ /
T08jsphustu:1269: anyo 'pi ca svāṃśāttāvatkālikatvena ca gṛhṇan na saṃvaraṃ saṃvarī jahāti /
T08jsphustu:1273: adattaṃ pu[naḥ] dravyaṃ utpluyedvadhvā khamākāśaṃ gatvā /
T08jsphustu:1282: bhṛtako vā sa ajñānāt smṛtisaṃpramoṣātkalpikasaṃjñayā vā paradravyaṃ gṛhṇan kṣatasaṃvaro bhavati /
T08jsphustu:1283: unmattavikṣiptacetasastu yatayaḥ parasvamādadānā api santonāpattibhājo bhavanti stainyacittābhāvāt //
T08jsphustu:1285: upakāryapakārimya ityārabhya yāvat tūṣṇīṃ datvetyādibhirvākyaiḥ duṣkṛtānyudāhṛtāni /
T08jsphustu:1294: nā ca strī ca paṇḍakaśceti nṛstrīpaṇḍakāsteṣāṃ yāni viṇmūtravaktrāṇi,
T08jsphustu:1296: tasmin aṅgajātaṃ puruṣendriyaṃ tilamātramapi prakṣipya yaḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ svādaṃ nigamayet sa kṣatasaṃvarā bhavati,
T08jsphustu:1298: manuṣyagativyatirikteṣvapi strīpuruṣapaṇḍakeṣu maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:1301: tatraike mānuṣāmānuṣāste tu tiryañca[śca] narādaya iti pāṭha matvaivaṃ vyācakṣate /
T08jsphustu:1307: amanuṣyagatiparyāpannāstiryaggatiparyāpannāśca nṛstrīpaṇḍakā jāgranto mṛtāḥ suptāśca maithunāśrayā avagantavyā iti /
T08jsphustu:1308: apare punarmānuṣā[mānuṣā]ste tu tiryañcaścāmarādaya iti pāṭhaṃ matvaivaṃ bruva[te] /
T08jsphustu:1312: ta eva nṛstrīpaṇḍakā manuṣyagatiparigṛhītāḥ amanuṣyagatiparigṛhītāḥ tiryaggatiparigṛhītāśca pratyekaṃ jāgranto mṛtāḥ suptāśca maithunāśrayā jñeyāḥ /
T08jsphustu:1313: amarādaya ityamarā devāḥ ādiśabdenānyāmapi gati grāhayati /
T08jsphustu:1314: ato devāsuranarakapretagatisaṃgṛhīteṣvapi strīpuruṣapaṇḍakeṣu maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavati /
T08jsphustu:1316: anyathā hi narādaya ityanena nṛstrītareṣāṃ grahaṇe siddhe tviti tacchabdagrahaṇamatiricyate /
T08jsphustu:1317: (SŚ 45) atha mataṃ- tacchabdena ta eva mānuṣāmānuṣāḥ saṃbadhyanta ityasaṃbaddhametat /
T08jsphustu:1318: na hi pratyakṣāpātteṣu śabdeṣu tacchabdaḥ prayujyata sūribhiranavasthāprasaṅgāt /
T08jsphustu:1319: na cāpi tacchabdena viṇmūtravaktrarandhrasya saṃbandha iti pāryate vaktuṃ,
T08jsphustu:1321: iha ca te tviti puṃliṅgena bahuvacanena nirdeśāt /
T08jsphustu:1322: atha mataṃ- viṇmatravaktrarandhraviśeṣā iti vyākhyāsyāma iti /
T08jsphustu:1324: maithunāśrayā jñeyā ityapūrvāyaṃ kriyākāra[ka]saṃbandhaḥ narādīnāmiti saṃbandhaṣaṣṭhayabhāvāt
T08jsphustu:1327: evaṃ vicārite kecidatra bruvata narādaya ityapi pāṭhe ādiśabdena strīpaṇḍakayoranya[syā]śca gateḥ parigraho bhaviṣyati /
T08jsphustu:1329: atra na sarvā tiryagyonirabhipretā sūkṣmaudārikatvena maithunākṣamatvāt /
T08jsphustu:1333: atrāntarāle yānyonyāpekṣayākṣudrikā maṃhato jātiḥ tāṃ tāṃ gacchan tasyāṃ tasyā jātau maithunamācaran vratāccyavate,
T08jsphustu:1339: yatirna kevalaṃ maithunamadhyācaritaṃ na kṣamate strīdarśanādyapi na kṣamata iti pratipāda[ya]nnāha /
T08jsphustu:1341: yatiḥ saṃraktaḥ san striyaṃ na paśyet,
T08jsphustu:1347: kiṃ punaḥ pāṭitāyāmapi maithunamadhyācarataḥ saṃvaratyāgo bhavati?
T08jsphustu:1349: strīndriyādhiṣṭhānasaṃjñitāṃ koṭarikāṃ vātātapādinā śuṣkāṃ śastreṇavā pṛthak pṛthak kṛtāṃ tattailādibhiḥ klinnāṃ saṃyojyaikīkṛtya yaḥ śrāmaṇero vipratipadyate sa nāśayitavyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1355: tasyā adhaḥ khaṇḍe upari khaṇḍe ca vinīlādhmātikāñcavratī na vrajet /
T08jsphustu:1356: yā cāsthisaṅkalā pūyarudhirādibhiramyaktā tāmapi na yāyāt /
T08jsphustu:1359: śailamayī yā śilāyāṃ nidhātā dārumayī yā kāṣṭhamayī,
T08jsphustu:1361: tāṃ sitāsthisaṅkalāṃ yāvatpustamayīṃ striyaṃ na gacchet /
T08jsphustu:1364: tasmātsadā sarvakālaṃ yo virata iti yativiśeṣaṇaṃ //
T08jsphustu:1368: dhyānamiddhagatastaṃ dhyānasamāpannaṃ nidrayābhibhūtaṃ ca vibuddhamapi śayitaṃ surāpānādinā
T08jsphustu:1369: mattaṃ mahābhūtavaiṣamyādinā vā vikṣiptacittaṃ rukṣayā vā vedanayā tunnaṃ vyathitaṃ
T08jsphustu:1370: yati yā kācitstrī balādgṛhītvā yateraṅgajātaṃ ātmīye 'ṅgajāte prakṣipet /
T08jsphustu:1374: madhye paryavasāne ca ya āsvāda nigamayet /
T08jsphustu:1382: nānā prakārāṇāṃ vyañjanānāṃ rasānāṃ nānāvidhena yadupetaṃ samanvitaṃ śāliḥbhaktaṃ tasya paribhogaḥ tadvadāsvādanā draṣṭavyā /
T08jsphustu:1383: yathā śauṇḍasya mattavālakasya tailava[t] svacchasyānnāsavasya surāyāḥ pānāsvādastadvat maithunāsvādo 'vaseyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1384: anye anyathā vyācakṣate śuṇḍiṣu bhavaḥ śauṇḍaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1407: tena rāgādinā praguṇībhūtaṃ yadaṃgajātaṃ tacchukranirmokṣārthaṃ na kadācidapi spṛśet /
T08jsphustu:1412: tīvrarāgāditayā yadi śukrasya muktirbhavet tadā yatirmānasaṃ vigarhedvirūpakaṃ mayā kṛtaṃ na punarevaṃ kariṣyāmīti /
T08jsphustu:1423: alīkasvapno yathā dṛṣṭaḥ tathā na bhavatya'līkaṃ mṛṣeti kṛtvā,
T08jsphustu:1426: svapnasvapno yaḥ svapna evānyaḥ svapno dṛśyate /
T08jsphustu:1427: tadukta bhavati- yasya yateḥ svapne śukranirmokṣo bhavati,
T08jsphustu:1429: anyathā hya'nāśvāsikaṃ brahmacaryaṃ syāt svapne 'pi maithunādhyācāreṇāpattiprasaṅgāt //
T08jsphustu:1430: rāgetyādi / rāgeṇāviṣṭaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yaccittaṃ tena rāgāviṣṭena cetasā yatirnārīṃ striyaṃ śrīghano na spṛśet /
T08jsphustu:1436: stanau kakṣe ca oṣṭhau ca nābhiśca ūrū ca pārśve ca kukṣiśca malabhramaśceti dvandvaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1437: atastān stanakakṣauṣṭhanābhyūrupārśvakukṣimalabhramān yatiḥ saṃraktaḥ san na nindet,
T08jsphustu:1440: aśobhanau tava payodharau śobhanau vā yāvadaṅgajāta iti /
T08jsphustu:1445: yat yadvacanaṃ striyāḥ antike striyaṃ śrīghanaḥ maithunādhyācāraṃ kartukāmaḥ puruṣo
T08jsphustu:1446: bravroti yathā yatheti yena yena prakāreṇa [tat]tadvacanaṃ yatiḥ striyaṃ na vadet
T08jsphustu:1449: yā strī māṃ paricarenmama paricaryāṃ kuryāt /
T08jsphustu:1462: agrā bhavati sā yoṣidityevamādikaṃ vācaṃ na vadet /
T08jsphustu:1468: tena pluṣṭaṃ dagdhaṃ mānasaṃ ceto yasya sa evamucyate /
T08jsphustu:1474: strīpuruṣayoḥ saṃyogārthaṃ dautyaṃ kartuṃ na labhyata iti darśayitumāha /
T08jsphustu:1477: anyena paribhuktasya mātṛgna masya saṃgrahaṇamāvāhaḥ vivāhaścāvāhaśca vivāhāvāhau /
T08jsphustu:1485: taiḥ kutsārtho darśanīyaḥ- kathaṃ kutsitosau yatiriti?
T08jsphustu:1491: na kevalaṃ vivāhāvāhanimittaṃ dautyaṃ na kuryāttatkṣaṇamaithunādhyācāranimittamapi na kurvātāpiśabdaḥ sūcayati /
T08jsphustu:1494: tasmai śrāddhāyopāsakadārakāya imāṃ śrāddhāṃ upāsakadārikāṃ dāpayeyamiti /
T08jsphustu:1498: etānevāśvādīn bījārthaṃ parebhyaḥ kadācidapi na prārthayet //
T08jsphustu:1501: bahavaḥ striyo yasya taṃ bahustrīkaṃ puruṣaṃ yatiḥ naivaṃ vadet- kimiti ekayā striyā sārdhaṃ mā tvaṃ tiṣṭha,
T08jsphustu:1508: samyagaviparītaṃ samantāt jñeyaṃ buddhā iti saṃbuddhāḥ /
T08jsphustu:1513: teṣāṃ yat jñānaṃ darśanañca tat mamāsti,
T08jsphustu:1515: asaṃvidyamānamapi santaṃ yaḥ śrāmaṇero mṛṣā vakti sa nāśanīyo 'śrāmaṇeratvena dhārayitavya ityarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1516: kiṃ punarabhimānādapi yo bravīti so 'pi nāśyaḥ? netyāha /
T08jsphustu:1519: anyatra bhīṣmadroṇābhyāṃ sarve yodhāḥ parāṅmukhā iti anyatraśabdasya varjanārthe prayogadarśanāt /
T08jsphustu:1520: aprāpte uttaraviśeṣādhigame prāpto mayeti manyamānasya yā cittasyonnatiḥ sobhimānaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1521: tasmādabhimānādyo jñānaṃ darśanañca pra[ti]jānīte tasya saṃvaratyāgo na bhavati prāptasaṃjñitvāt /
T08jsphustu:1522: yaduktaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ mamāstīti bruvan mithyā nāśya iti tatra katarajjñānaṃ katamacca darśanamiti na jñāyate /
T08jsphustu:1537: tatra bodhanaṃ bodhiravagamaḥ avabodhaḥ parijñānaṃ bodhijñānārthatvāt /
T08jsphustu:1540: tenāyaṃ vākyārtho jāyate- duḥkhādīnāmāryasatyānāṃ nirvāṇābhimukhā samyagaviparītā yā bodhistajjñānamucyate /
T08jsphustu:1545: divyaṃ śroto yena dūrāsannāḥ śabdā śrūyante devamanuṣyāṇāmantaśaḥ kuntapipīlikasyāpi,
T08jsphustu:1546: paracittajñānaṃ yena parakīyān cittacaittān jānāti- sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgamityādi,
T08jsphustu:1547: pūrvanivāsānusmṛtikṣānaṃ yenātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ cābhinivṛttajātiparaṃparāḥ smarati- amutrāhaṃ evannāmā evaṃgotrāka ityādi,
T08jsphustu:1548: āstravakṣayajñānaṃ yenātmano jānāti- kṣīṇā me jātiruṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ yāvannāparamitthatvamiti /
T08jsphustu:1552: dharmatattvālambanaṃ jñānaṃ dharmajñānaṃ yena kleśān prajahāti /
T08jsphustu:1553: yatparasantānānugamaṃ jñānaṃ pratyātmavedyamutpadyate yairanyaiḥ kleśaprahāṇaṃ kṛtaṃ,
T08jsphustu:1554: ye pi sāṃprataṃ kurvanti kariṣyanti vā tepīdṛśameva jñānamadhigatavantau'dhigacchanti adhigamiṣyantītyetadanvayajñānaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1560: dharmajñānādīnāmaṅgīkaraṇe anyaṃ pūrvokto na yogya iti saṃvaratyāgo bhavatīti //
T08jsphustu:1562: āryaśabdenātrāryadeśajāḥ puruṣāḥ parigṛhyante na prahīṇakleśāḥ mlecchaśabdena ca śavarādayaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1563: teṣāṃ yadvacanaṃ tena lekhena deśāntarasthasya lipyā saṃmukhameva likhitvā /
T08jsphustu:1567: lekhādiṣvaparān bodhayataḥ saṃvaratyāgo na bhavati vākpravyāhārābhāvāt //
T08jsphustu:1569: ahamekākyadvitīyo vṛkṣamūle viharāmi śūnye ca mandire gṛhe ahaṃ rame,
T08jsphustu:1570: mama ca yaccittaṃ tadekāgraṃ samāhitamityevamādi atīndriyaṃ vastu yatinā na vācyaṃ //
T08jsphustu:1574: sa bahudhā tathā gatasya loke khyāpayitavyaḥ svaparārthasaṃpādakatvāt /
T08jsphustu:1575: ityapi sa bhagavān daśabhirbalaiḥ samanvāgataścaturbhiḥ vaiśāradyaiḥ tribhiḥ smṛtyupasthānaiḥ mahākaruṇayā ceti /
T08jsphustu:1577: ātmanastu guṇaḥ kenacidapi prakāreṇa na vaktavyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1579: pṛṣṭastu san yatiḥ parakīyaṃ guṇaṃ saṃvidyamānaṃ vadettatrāpi tasya guṇavataḥ pudgalasya saṃmukhaṃ na vadet //
T08jsphustu:1581: yadāha brūyāttatsaṃmukhaṃ na tu [iti] vistareṇānadhigatasvabhāvamṛṣāvādalakṣaṇaṃ pratipādayitumanā cāryānāryavyavahārānupanyasati /
T08jsphustu:1585: apare punarāhuḥ- dṛṣṭaṃ yat pañcabhirindriyaiḥ paricchinnaṃ,
T08jsphustu:1602: etāni pañcāṅgāni yasya santi sa pañcāṅgaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1605: anṛtaḥ vādaḥ yasyāstīti [sa] anṛtavādikaḥ mṛṣāvādīti yorthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1606: tatra vastu ca bhavatīti- yathā paricchinnaṃ tathā tadastītyarthato na tu dravyatostīti,
T08jsphustu:1607: anyathā hyasaṃvidyamānaṃ vastva'stoti jñātvā nāstīti bruvato 'nāpattiḥ syāt /
T08jsphustu:1608: alīkasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti- yathā paricchinnādanyathā kathayāmītyeva saṃjñā ityarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1611: evamapi mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti atraivāntargatatvāt kasmāta pṛthagucyate /
T08jsphustu:1614: tasminstu satīda yathārtha paricchinnajñeyaviparītārthadyātinyā vācaḥ samutthāpakaṃ cittaṃ pṛthageva kāraṇatvenocyata iti naitasminnantarbhāvaḥ
T08jsphustu:1615: tathā ca vinaye vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ vinidhāya citaṃ vācaṃ bhāṣata iti mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī ca bhavatīti paravañcanābhiprāya ityarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1616: vitathasaṃjñino 'nyaḥ ko viśeṣa iti cet vitathasaṃjñī hayanyathārthaṃ pratipādayati na tu paraṃ vañcayati /
T08jsphustu:1617: tathā ca mṛṣāvāda iṣyate yathā śnigdhaste mukhavarṇa ityādinā /
T08jsphustu:1620: yastu mṛṣāvādasaṃjñī so 'vaśyaṃ vitathasaṃjñīti yena dvābhyāmevāṅgābhyāṃ mṛṣāvāda iṣyata iti /
T08jsphustu:1624: caturaṅgavanti yāni vacāṃsi tāni mṛṣāvādavyapadeśabhāñji bhavantīti /
T08jsphustu:1628: pūrvamuktāni yānyaṅgāni te[bhyaḥ] varjitāni yānyaṅgāni taiḥ samanvāgato yo yatirmṛṣā vakti,
T08jsphustu:1640: (SŚ 57) anyathā hi saṃkhyānupūrvī vidhānārthamekenāṅgena mṛṣāvādī bhavati,
T08jsphustu:1656: kṣudrā laghīyasī sā āpattiḥ duṣkṛtasaṃjñitā saiva nimitta kāraṇaṃ codanāyāḥ tena kṣudrāpattinimittena /
T08jsphustu:1667: taiḥ pratyekaṃ hīnamadhyotkṛṣṭaiḥ vratī prāṇān pudgalān jihmakaraṇārthaṃ niṣpratibhānakaraṇārthaṃ na jātu kadāciccodayet /
T08jsphustu:1673: upakleśādinā vratī vratinamāśayenābhiprāyeṇa puroktena jihmaniṣpratibhānakaraṇābhiprāyeṇa brūyānnaiva kadācaneti,
T08jsphustu:1677: anena ca ślokadvayena codyasya pudgalasya caturvidhānyūnatoktā- jātivādena kulanyūnatā,
T08jsphustu:1684: yaterapratirūpatvātprakṛtisāvadyatvācca paiśunyamācarituṃ na labhyata iti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:1686: ayaṃ pudgalo anena pudgalena saha bhetsyati,
T08jsphustu:1687: mayā saha saṃvāsyatīti evaṃ matvā yatirjātyādivādena paiśunyaṃ na samācaret /
T08jsphustu:1688: tatra kārikātrayeṇa saṃvaratyāga uktaḥ śeṣaistu ślokaiḥ pañcāṅgāni,
T08jsphustu:1697: yasmāt surāmaireyamadyapānaṃ pramādasya kuśaladharmānavahitatāyā āspadaṃ pratiṣṭhā,
T08jsphustu:1698: tasmātkāraṇādyatibhistatsurāmaireyamadyaṃ parasmai na deyaṃ na cātmanā pātavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1701: yathā śuno mūtraṃ parasmai na dīyate na cātmanā pīyate,
T08jsphustu:1716: ebhirapi kācitsurā saṃcīyata ityetāḥ surā jñātavyāḥ //
T08jsphustu:1721: guḍena dhātryā ambunā dhātakyā ca yatsaṃskṛtaṃ niṣpāditaṃ rasāntaraṃ tanmaireyamucyate /
T08jsphustu:1722: surāmaireyamadyaṃ tadyasmānmadanīyamataḥ kuśāgreṇāpi pātuṃ yatīnāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ na prakalpate,
T08jsphustu:1726: surāmaireyavyatiriktamanyadapi madanīyaṃ vastu paribhoktuṃ na labhyata iti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:1735: ata eva madanīyaṃ pūgaphalādi jñātvā na bhakṣaṇīyaṃ //
T08jsphustu:1737: kodravānnaṃ ca bhuñjīta na ca syāt duṣkṛtaṃ kathaṃ //
T08jsphustu:1739: sphuṭārthāyāṃ śrīghanācārasaṃgrahaṭīkāyāṃ surāmaireyamadyapānaviratiśikṣāpadaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ samāptaṃ //
T08jsphustu:1745: tasyāṣṭau yānyaṅgulāni tatpramāṇaṃ pādakamasyeti jināṣṭāṅgulapādakaṃ śayanāsanaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1749: yacchayanāsanaṃ pramāṇapuruṣahastapramāṇapādakaṃ tasmin mañce pīṭhe vā yatiḥ śrāmaṇeraḥ āsīta [u]paviśedityarthaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1753: ataḥ pramāṇādhike mañce pīṭhe vā ya upaviśati,
T08jsphustu:1756: suvarṇarūpyamaye tu mañce pīṭhe vā jināṣṭāṅgulapramāṇepyupaviṣṭuṃ [na] labhyata iti /
T08jsphustu:1762: kintu kasyacidiyamāśaṅkā syāt sāṃghike rukmarūpyamaye śayanāsane upaviśato na kaściddoṣaḥ paudgalikasyaiva sparśapratiṣedhāditi /
T08jsphustu:1769: tatrāpi jināṣṭāṅgulapramāṇe 'pi mañce pīṭhe vā vinā pratyāstaraṇenopaviṣṭuṃ [na] labhyata iti darśayitumāha /
T08jsphustu:1776: sūkṣmasya vastrasya tripuṭaṃ ghanasya vastrasya dvipuṭaṃ kambalasya ekapuṭaṃ pratyāstaraṇamiṣṭaṃ,
T08jsphustu:1780: atirekaprāmāṇike sāṃghike śayanāsane yathā pratipattavyaṃ tathā darśanannāha /
T08jsphustu:1790: kiṃ evaṃ vratī niṣeveta sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanaṃ?
T08jsphustu:1793: athavā caturṣu kīlakeṣu tānatirekapramāṇakān pādān ṭaṃkitvā badhvā kiṃ kartavyamiti na jñāyate kriyākāra[ka]saṃbandhasya parisamāptatvāt /
T08jsphustu:1800: tatrāpi gṛhiṇāṃ śayanāsane yatinā na pādau lambīyayitavyau- mā bhūjjanāvadhyānamiti //
T08jsphustu:1801: pravrajyāṃ prasāṇīkṛtya yathāvṛddhikayā sāṃghikaṃ vihāramuddeṣṭavyamiti darśayannāha /
T08jsphustu:1803: yadi bahavaḥ śrāmaṇerā bhavanti vihārāśca stokāstadā ekaikaṃ vi[hā]raṃ dvādaśebhyaḥ śrāmaṇerebhyo dātavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1805: tadā antato 'gatyā nirmuṣṭakaṃ hastamekaikasmai śrāmaṇerāya dātavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1809: tadā ekaismai api śrāmaṇerāya bahavo vihārā dātavyāḥ /
T08jsphustu:1812: yadi stokaṃ śayanāsanaṃ bhavati yatayaśca bahavaḥ,
T08jsphustu:1813: tadā tatra yo vṛddhaḥ sa mañce svapet /
T08jsphustu:1817: navakena tvabhyavakāśaka ityevaṃ yathāvṛddhikayā sāṃghikaṃ śayanāsanamuddeṣṭavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1828: evamarthaṃ sāṃghika śayanāsanamuddiśyate na vyasanitayeti darśayati //
T08jsphustu:1831: yadi bhūyāṃsi layanāni santi saṃvariṇaścālpīyānsastadā āgantukānāṃ bhikṣūṇāmavasthitaye layanatrayaṃ sthāpayitavyaṃ kīdṛśamityāha /
T08jsphustu:1835: teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ layanānāṃ madhye yaduttamaṃ layanaṃ tadvṛddhāyāgantukabhikṣave uddeṣṭavyaṃ yanmadhyaṃ tattato navakāya,
T08jsphustu:1853: yasmin krīḍāsthāne utsavādike gatvā vigataśokāḥ syuḥ strīpuruṣāstatkrīḍāsthānaṃ vigataśokaṃ yatirna yāyāt /
T08jsphustu:1854: yastu śrāmaṇero hṛṣṭaḥ san nṛ[tya]ti gāyati vāditraṃ vādagrati,
T08jsphustu:1869: pūrvaṃ munaye buddhāya bhagavate candanādikaṃ gandhaṃ datvā paścādātmanā dhārayet /
T08jsphustu:1870: svasthastu yatiḥ kadācidapi candanādikaṃ gandhaṃ na dhārayet //
T08jsphustu:1872: sati prakaṭe deśe candanādyanuliptagātro yatiḥ glāno 'pi sanna tiṣṭhet /
T08jsphustu:1885: netraduḥkhena śiraḥśūlena pūtanāgraheṇa ca rujituṃ śīlaṃ yasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1890: haritālādicūrṇena sugandhinā vā tailena varṇārthaṃ rūpaniṣpattyarthaṃ yatiḥ vadanādikaṃ gātraṃ na marṣayet //
T08jsphustu:1897: ādarśe tailabhājane jalabhājane vā mukhaṃ na nirīkṣeta /
T08jsphustu:1898: kṛtagaṇḍāditvena śirovyathena śirovedhaduḥkhena gadena vyādhinā ca ya āturo glānaḥ taṃ muktvā anyena nirīkṣaṇīyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1900: yatiḥ maṇḍanārthamātmano mukhaṃ tailena nābhyañjayedantaśaḥ pānīyenāpi /
T08jsphustu:1903: āsyaṃ mukhañca sphuṭitaṃ yasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1907: piṭakasya tu śamanārthaṃ tilakalāpaprabhṛtibhiḥ lepa iṣṭo 'bhipreta iti yāvat /
T08jsphustu:1908: yastu yatiḥ śaithilikatvādinā yathoktaṃ vidhiṃ na saṃpādayati,
T08jsphustu:1919: tasmād yuṣmābhirapi divase bhoktavyaṃ na rātrāviti /
T08jsphustu:1923: rātrau piṇḍapātamaṭatāṃ aśucigarte mūtragarte ca pāto bhavati /
T08jsphustu:1924: aśvacoreṇa gocoreṇāhinā sarpeṇa ca samāgamo bhavati /
T08jsphustu:1925: evamapi sati ete yataya udarasya kukṣeḥ pūraṇārthaṃ rātrau naḥ asmākaṃ gṛhe piṇḍapātamaṭantīti jano 'vadhyātavān /
T08jsphustu:1926: janairavadhyāte 'pi te yatayaḥ divāpratyūṣasi sāyahnakāle ca piṇḍapātamaṭitumārabdhāḥ /
T08jsphustu:1929: ete bhikṣavaḥ sāyahnakāle prātaḥ prabhāte ca sabhācatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mandireṣu gṛheṣu ca aṭanti bhramanti bhuñjate cāsatkṛtyaṃ ca kurvantīti janairavadhyātaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1932: praśastamapunarāvṛttyā niḥśeṣaṃ vā gata iti sugataḥ,
T08jsphustu:1939: keśamātreṇāpyanatīto 'saṃkrānto madhyāhno yenoditenādityena sa evamucyate, tasmin /
T08jsphustu:1946: yāvajjīvikena pippalyādinā tailādinā pānakaiśca yatparivarjitaṃ tatkālikaṃ /
T08jsphustu:1951: galake vā praveśyata ityanena nāsikayāpi yatpīyate tadapi galakenevābhyavahriyata iti,
T08jsphustu:1955: kukṣerupastambhakaṃ paripūrakaṃ karotīti kukṣiviṣṭabhaṃkṛt yade[ta]tsarvaṃ tatkāle ādyādityodite,
T08jsphustu:1965: tenārtaḥ san himaṃ yatiḥ pibediti śeṣaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1966: kathaṃ punaḥ kalpikodakaṃ grāhyamityenaṃ vikalpya avasarīkartumāha /
T08jsphustu:1971: yāvatā kālena dvau hastau prakṣālyamānau sarudhirau bhavataḥ,
T08jsphustu:1976: yukto yatistayoḥ prakṣālanaṃ na kuryāt yadi prakṛtyaiva snigdhatvagbhikṣubhavati,
T08jsphustu:1977: tasya snigdhatvaco yateḥ yau hastau tau saśabdau bhavataḥ,
T08jsphustu:1984: yadi mahyaṃ vikāle bhoktuṃ na dāsyatha ityevaṃ yadi kaścidvirukto yatirbūyāt,
T08jsphustu:1985: tadā sa yatiḥ pūrṇe maṇḍakuṇḍe prakṣeptavyaḥ /
T08jsphustu:1990: aṣṭābhiḥ jale dhautaṃ prakṣālitaṃ yaddhānyaṃ kalpikena ca vastreṇa baddhaṃ tadanāmiṣe pātre tāmrabhājane anyatra vā prasthāpanaṃ diśeddadyādityarthaḥ
T08jsphustu:1991: yadi tu taddhānyaṃ sphuṭaṃ sphuṭitaṃ vā sat glānāya pātuṃ na kalpate //
T08jsphustu:1994: lobhenākuśalamūlena samutthāpitaṃ yatkāyavākkarma tena samupārjito yo vihāracīvarāhārastaṃ saviṣabhaktavadvarjayet /
T08jsphustu:2000: lākṣavikrayaṇaṃ ca vratī svayaṃ na kuryāt,
T08jsphustu:2002: na ca tena madyādinā jīvikāṃ kalpayet /
T08jsphustu:2007: vastrānnapānādikasya tu lābhasya prāptyartha yā cāṭuvāditā priyavāditā,
T08jsphustu:2011: anyadīyasya tu pātrāderyadvarṇanaṃ guṇodbhāvanaṃ lābhārthaṃ mahayametat pātrādikaṃ dadyāditi tatraimittikatvamucyate /
T08jsphustu:2013: alpena lābhena yadvṛddhiparyeṣaṇaṃ lābhānāṃ sā lipsetyucyate labdhumicchā lipseti arthāt /
T08jsphustu:2030: evamādike channaprakaṭe bhūpradeśe kiṃ tiṣṭhettatra na cellaka iti vakṣyate /
T08jsphustu:2034: guru (SŚ 72) kumārikā sthale vasatā avyūḍhā āste /
T08jsphustu:2035: etāḥ kiṃ? dyūtakāragṛhaṃ bandhanāgāraṃ anyacca yadvandhanasthānaṃ tat agocaro 'viṣaya ākhyātaḥ /
T08jsphustu:2041: sakalena kāyena hastābhyāṃ pādābhyāṃ vastreṇa chatrādinā ca vratī rajataṃ rūpyaṃ,
T08jsphustu:2054: campūkalahadantakāṣṭhādanāni kriyā yasya vṛddhāntikasya yateḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
T08jsphustu:2058: sa pūrvoktaśca kiṃ na vandyo yatinā yatiriti vakṣyate /
T08jsphustu:2060: mṛṇmayakarmaṇā yo vyāpṛto 'prāptāvasaraḥ yaśca tūrṇaṃ tvaritaṃ dvitribhūmikaṃ vihāramutkasati,
T08jsphustu:2064: sa vṛddhāntiko yatiḥ dvitribhūmikaṃ vihāramuttiṣṭhan yāvat pātraṃ vā pacan kiṃ na vandyo yatinā yatiriti vakṣyate /
T08jsphustu:2066: cūrṇakriyāyāṃ cailakriyāyāṃ vastrapātrādiśodhane ca yaḥ āsaktaḥ,
T08jsphustu:2072: yaḥ śrāmaṇero varcakuṭi prastrāvakuṭiṃ vā gacchati,
T08jsphustu:2077: sa vṛddhāntiko yatiḥ varcakuṭiṃ gacchan yāvaduttarāsaṃgaṃ prāvṛṇvan na vandya ityanena yādṛśyāmavasthāyāmavasthito vṛddhāntiko yatirnavakena na vanditavyaḥ,
T08jsphustu:2080: idānīṃ tu yādṛgvidhāvasthāvasthitena navakena yatinā na vaditavyaṃ,
T08jsphustu:2083: avaguṇṭhitaṃ pidhitaṃ śīrṣaṃ śiro yasya yateḥ tena samantaprāvṛtena vā yatinā kiṃ vandya iti vakṣyate /
T08jsphustu:2084: saha upanahā vartete pādau yasya yateḥ sa sopānatkaḥ,
T08jsphustu:2087: tayorjānunoryā jaṃghā tasyāṃ jaṃghāyāṃ muṇḍe[na] sphoṭaṃ na dadyāt /
T08jsphustu:2092: tadvadyatirapi vṛddhāntikasya yaterjaṃghāyāṃ na vandeteti yāvat /
T08jsphustu:2098: yathāsau ravirupānahārūḍhastadvadupānahārūḍhena yatinā na vandanīyamityakārapraśleṣenāvabodhayan vakti /
T08jsphustu:2100: kiṃ tarhi anveṣṭavyaṃ vinaye meḍhakasyaiva dṛṣṭāntadānāt /
T08jsphustu:2103: samavasthopaviṣṭasya yateḥ pādayugalaṃ karkaṭagrāhaṃ gṛhītvā śirasā vanditavyaṃ /
T08jsphustu:2104: yadā samavasthāniṣaṇṇo yatiḥ pādarogeṇa glānaḥ syāttadā vināpi karkaṭagrāhikayā vandyamānasya na doṣaḥ /
T08jsphustu:2116: dairghī haimantakī graiṣmī vārṣikī ca tathottarā /
T08jsphustu:2122: yathā vātapittaśleṣmādayaḥ kupitāḥ santo bādhanārthena rogā ityucyante,
T08jsphustu:2126: rāgādayo hyatitarāṃ rujayanti yasmādvātādayaśca kupitāḥ sakalaṃ janaughaṃ /
T08jsphustu:2127: tacchāntivāñchina parāḥ praṇateṣu tasmādārogyamastviti vaco nigadanti buddhāḥ //
T08jsphustu:2133: sa[ka]lairbhikṣubhiḥ śikṣākāmaiḥ vikālabhojanādikaṃ kṛtaṃ kasmādvayaṃ na kurma iti /
T08jsphustu:2134: āvāsakalpaḥ- amuṣmin vihāre bhikṣavo 'nyonyaṃ kāyasaṃsargaṃ kurvanti kasmādvayamapi na kurma iti /
T08jsphustu:2135: deśakalpaḥ- amuṣmin deśe vārddhuṣikabhikṣavaḥ kasmādvayamapi vṛddhi na prayacchāmaḥ /
T08jsphustu:2143: aśanavasanādau yathā pratipattavyaṃ tadupādhyāyācāryavṛddhatarebhyaḥ sakāśādyatinā śrotavyaṃ,
T08jsphustu:2146: etadantaroktaṃ śrīghanācārasaṃgrahaṃ saṃhatya yatsukṛtaṃ kuśalakṛtaṃ tena sukṛtena karmaṇā jano lokaḥ asaṃskṛtaṃ nirvāṇaṃ prāpnotu labhatāmityanena ślokena pariṇāmayati //
T08jsphustu:2151: śubhamativipulaṃ mayā yadāptaṃ bhavatu jano 'khilastu tena buddhaḥ //
T08jsphustu:2152: suśrīghanācārasusaṃgrahasya kṛtvā hi ṭīkāṃ yadavāpi puṇyaṃ /
